item.title: My First
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

Well I finally did it, I made something in java. I used this: http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/getStarted/cupojava/win32.html
And tried to understand it with this: http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/getStarted/application/index.html
This is what I made:

class HelloWorldApp {
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		System.out.println("Hello World!");
	}
}

But what does ’ public static void main(String[] args) { ’ Do and why is it needed, yes I know its a main method… -eh someone elaborate.

Read full topic
